text:
Test PDF Document
This is a test PDF document created to test the PDF extractor functionality. It contains multiple types of
content including regular text, tables with various structures, and images with text that can be extracted
using OCR.
Table 1: Simple Data Table
Product Price Quantity Total
Laptop $999 2 $1998
Mouse $25 5 $125
Keyboard $75 3 $225
Monitor $350 2 $700
Table 2: Complex Table with Merged Cells
Category Q1 Q2 Q3 Q4
Sales 1000 1200 1500 1800
Expenses 800 900 1000 1100
Profit 200 300 500 700
Images Section
Below are test images with text for OCR testing:

images.description: Image 1: A medium color wide/landscape image (300x100 pixels, PNG format)

text:
This document demonstrates various content types that the PDF extractor should be able to handle.
The extractor should successfully identify and extract: - Regular text paragraphs - Tables with different
structures - Images with embedded text (requires OCR)

images.description: Image 1: A medium color wide/landscape image (300x100 pixels, PNG format)
